sub_fields.label: Link Type
sub_fields.name: link_type
sub_fields.instructions: Select "Single" if you wish to link out of the top level item.

sub_fields.label: Double Row
sub_fields.name: double_row
sub_fields.instructions: Set to true when the column is too large and covers the size of two rows, prevents the other columns to be the same size as this one.

fields.label: Script Tag
fields.name: greenhouse_script_tag
fields.instructions: This tag will be added at bottom of the site HTML body tag
